section.title: Immediately Retiring a Virtual Machine
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine enables you to retire a virtual machine immediately.

procedure.title: To Immediately Retire a Virtual Machine

step.para: From InfrastructureVirtual Machines, click on the virtual machine that you need to remove the retirement date from.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The virtual machine is immediately stopped and cannot restart.
